root: ^Congratulations on exploring planet Jacynt. We hope you found lots of interesting elements about the planet itself and the life among it. It must have been hard work but at least you managed it.

c-0: ^The next planet we need you to explore is Ryn. This planet surrounded by lava so be safe Joe. The planet is known for having random volcanic explosions so try and be quick on this planet.
^Try and see if you can find another baby on this planet, they could be anywhere Joe so keep your eyes peeled.
